sections.content:
**Investing Overview** 🗻 

**A boxer must learn the jab + cross, just like you need to learn the basics.**

Build on a strong foundation and you'll get more powerful on the other side of the journey!

Here you'll learn:
✅ What expectations to have for the market
✅ Asset behavior
✅ Importance of different analysis
✅ Market competition

•




**Investing Principles 1** - Your Competition


**When is investing easy? 
When is it hard? 
Have the investing promoters of the world been keeping secrets from me?**

Here you'll learn the TRUTH:
✅ Why trading/investing is hard
✅ What information works - What information doesn't
✅ Where the market is dangerous - Where it's safer

•




**Investing Principles 4** - The News Myth


**Where to get the best news!?**

How do you keep up to date with what's going on in the crypto world? It might be more difficult than you think.

You'll learn the difference between 3 types of information and their predictive ability:
✅ Leading
✅ Coincident
✅ Lagging

•




**Investing Principles 5** - Altcoin Investing Dangers


**Altcoins!**

Most of you guys are super impatient and think that you're going to miss out on a life changing ALT pump if you don't have all your money in ALT's **RIGHT FUCKING NOW.**

Wrong... Rookie Mistake...

⬇️ Watch the video to understand why ⬇️

•




**Investing Principles 6** - Diversification


**Can you get something for nothing?**

In the following video, you'll learn about:
✅ How diversification works
✅ What its limitations are
✅ Why its more than just an asset selection method

•




**Investing Principles 7** - Introduction to Correlation


**CORRELATION**

Grow up and use your brains. Stop getting seduced by stories.

Anyone holding big bags of $altcoins, first understand correlation and have a think if you're actually holding a diversified portfolio, or just a giant bag of leveraged bitcoin bets?

If you want to know where some random $XYZ token is going, first calculate its correlation to $BTC, then give yourself an uppercut.

•




**Investing Principles 8** - Beginners Portfolio Management


**You wouldn't fill your house with garbage. So why do you fill your portfolio full of shit?**

Super rare for anyone to make it in this game because they set themselves up for failure from day 1.

Everyone always fills their portfolios with garbage tokens and shitcoins.

In this lecture you'll learn:
✅ How to set up the ideal beginner portfolio
✅ Why managing risk is more important than chasing rewards
✅ Why chasing 100 tokens is not an efficient use of your time

•




**Investing Principles 9** - Beginners Quantitative Asset Selection


**What should you buy, and why? Lets dive into the most important consideration of an asset...** 🤼 

Learn:
✅ What 'rationality' is in a financial sense
✅ Why 'token selection' is mostly a pointless endeavor
✅ Why 'performance ratios' are our #1 weapon
✅ The hidden nature of market-cap risk

•




**Investing Principles 10** - Dollar Cost Averaging


**Dollar Cost Averaging (DCA)**

An investing method that allows you to get the best possible price for your money at all times!

Here you'll learn:
✅ What DCA'ing is
✅ Why is superior for most people
✅ How to deploy it

•




**Investing Principles 11** - Price Analysis Principles


**Idiots leave money behind constantly when they don't understand these basics.**

A professional has a weapon in every situation,  so here are 3 core tactical principals when it comes to investing:

✅ 1. Is it 'expensive' or 'cheap'? 
- The least difficult of the 3 over a long time horizon (Years). 
- Hard because expensive things can keep getting more expensive, cheap things can keep getting cheaper etc.
- Difficult due to noise/randomness in the movements of the market, but can be used in mean-reversion strategies.

✅ 2. Is it 'trending up' or 'trending down'?
- Often wrong in ranging markets, but gives exposure to the large sweeping moves when they occur.
- Harder than #1,  but still easier than #3...

❌ 3. Where is it going next and when? 
- Impossible to answer, but easy to ask, hence why its the first question most idiots ask.

No one REALLY knows where anything is going in 3-6 months, but we have probabilistic methods of entering the market when there is a high probability of making money.

Expanding on this in the following video, you'll learn about:
✅ Indicator types
✅ Indicator sub-types
✅ What to do if you miss the best entry

•




**Investing Principles 12** - The Stop-Loss Myth


**Stop losses are an easy way of managing positions!**

✅ Combined with Take-Profit levels you can't lose!

❌ ...or can you??

In the following video, you'll learn about:
✅ Probabilistic price behavior
✅ The importance of active trade management
✅ The importance of accumulating high quality edges

•




**Investing Principles 13** - Investing Summary


📜A summary of all the lessons so far so you can review them in a time efficient manner📜

•




**Investing Principles 14** - Time for a Special Lesson 🪄

||**“When people overtly display some trait, such as confidence or hypermasculinity, they are most often concealing the contrary reality.”**||
•

  

                                                                                                                                                                                  
> **Congratulations, you completed** <#1143396372968640603>.
> 
> 
> On to the next channel <#1143410595786395778>.
